auth.title: Authenticate with Bosch
auth.description:
**IMPORTANT:** Copy the URL below and paste it into a new browser tab (don't click the link directly):

`{auth_url}`

1. Log in with your Bosch Flow account

2. After logging in, open your browser's Developer Tools (F12)

3. Go to the Network tab and look for a failed redirect request

4. Find the URL that starts with 'onebikeapp-ios://...'

5. Copy just the 'code' parameter from that URL
   Example: onebikeapp-ios://...?code=**COPY_THIS_PART**

6. Paste the code below:
